subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning became the first N.F.L. player to throw 12 touchdown passes in the season’s first three games, topping Tom Brady’s 11 in 2011, as the Broncos beat the Raiders, 37-21.
snippet: Peyton Manning became the first N.F.L. player to throw 12 touchdown passes in the season’s first three games, topping Tom Brady’s 11 in 2011, as the Broncos beat the Raiders, 37-21.
